sourcesContent:
<template>
	<full-calendar 
    :options="calendarOptions"
  

    />
    
</template>

<script>


  import FullCalendar from '@fullcalendar/vue'
import dayGridPlugin from '@fullcalendar/daygrid'
import interactionPlugin from '@fullcalendar/interaction'
  import { mapGetters, mapMutations } from 'vuex'


	export default {
  components: {
    FullCalendar,
  },
  data() {
    var self =this;
    return {   
      calendarOptions: {
        plugins: [ dayGridPlugin, interactionPlugin ],
        initialView: 'dayGridMonth'
      }, 
       
      config: {
        select: function(arg) {
          
          console.log(arg.format('YYYY-MM-DD'));
          self.addEvent(arg);
        },
        defaultView: 'month'
      }
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters(["EVENTS"])
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapMutations([
      'ADD_EVENT'
    ]),
    addEvent: function(info){
      this.ADD_EVENT(
           {
            title: "Something",
            start: info.start,
            end: info.end,
            allDay:info.allDay
          })
    },
    handleSelect: function(arg) {
          console.log(arg);
          self.addEvent(arg);
        }
    
  }
  
  }


</script>
